original_text: will fail to receive many times as much in this age, and in the age to come eternal life.”
korean_text: 현세에 여러 배를 받고 내세에 영생을 받지 못할 자가 없느니라 하시니라

sentences.original_text: will fail to receive many times as much in this age
sentences.korean_translation: 이 시대에 몇 배나 많은 것을 받지 못할 것이다

sentences.original_text: and in the age to come
